meaningMnemonic: I have a <kanji>suspicion</kanji> (容疑) about <kanji>someone</kanji>. That someone is my main <vocabulary>suspect</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. Will help to be able to read 容疑 first, though.
